story:
Once upon a time, in a small village nestled between the rolling hills, there lived a young boy named Ethan. Ethan was a kind and compassionate child who loved to explore the world around him.

One day, while wandering through the woods near his home, Ethan stumbled upon an old, weathered book resting on a moss-covered stone. Curious, he opened the book and found that it was filled with stories of great courage, wisdom, and faith. As he read through the pages, Ethan felt a sense of wonder and awe wash over him.

That night, as Ethan lay in bed, he couldn't stop thinking about the stories he had read. He found himself gazing up at the twinkling stars through his window and felt a deep sense of peace and comfort surrounding him.

Suddenly, a warm, gentle voice whispered in his ear, "Do not be afraid, for I am with you always." Ethan smiled, knowing that it was God speaking to him.

From that day on, Ethan treasured the stories he had found in the old book, knowing that they were filled with powerful lessons and timeless truths. And as he drifted off to sleep each night, he felt a deep sense of reassurance and love, knowing that he was never alone.

And so, dear child, remember that God is always watching over you, guiding you with love and wisdom. As you close your eyes and drift off to dreamland, may you feel His presence comforting you and protecting you through the night. Goodnight, sweet child, and may your dreams be filled with love and light. Amen.
